name: Techno Tower
description:
This game was made for the 2019 LÖVE Jam in 3 days.

Use the WASD keys to move your character through the rhythmically enhanced puzzles.

Hover over the sound icon to change volume.

Escape to "pause".

Assets used:

  • Logo font "62 Dragz" by Youssef Habchi
    https://www.dafont.com/62dragz.font
  • Text font "Hemi Head" by Typodermic Fonts
    https://www.dafont.com/hemi-head.font
